Method Detail

castArray

public static final Object[] castArray(Object[] src,
                                       Class targetType)
This method is somewhat simplified way to cast an array. Here is a simple example of how to use it: 
 
  import gov.nih.nlm.umls.jekyll.util.JavaToolkit;
 
  // somewhere in your code...
  Object[] someData = ...;
  String[] someDataAsString = (String[]) castArray( someData, String.class );

Parameters:
src - an array to be casted
targetType - the type of the target entity
Returns:
the casted array

isInteger

public static boolean isInteger(String str)
Checks a specified string whether it only contains integers.

Parameters:
str - a string to be checked
Returns:
true if the string consists of integers, false otherwise.

tokenizeString

public static String[] tokenizeString(String str)
Breaks down a space delimited string into its constituent words.

Parameters:
str - a string to be parsed
Returns:
an array of tokens
